messages.subject: Conference dates
messages.msgSnippet: Elissa Jill, You are so right. :-) This year is so much easier to deal with the $$. I put up a little $ each pay day. It was easier for me. When I realized I d
messages.messageBody:
Elissa Jill,
You are so right. :-) This year is so much easier to deal with the $$. I
put up a little $ each pay day. It was easier for me. When I realized I'd
need to go a day earlier, so I wouldn't miss anything <G>, it wasn't hard
to just add a little to make up the hotel $. It's taken all year but It's
well worth it to me and my family. I wish they all wanted to go.
I'm not going to get caught up on digests tonight. Maybe tomorrow night.
LOL!


Barb E
"We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty,
charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures
that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open."

- Jawaharlal Nehru, Prime Minister of India





> Here's my opinion (FWIW) I think that the conferences should ALL be held
> within the same month of each year. Monetarily, if one year it is in November
> and
> the next year it is in April. I'll have to choose ONE. We need to save money
> up out of our other expenses to attend and truly NEED that year of savings to
> attend. Maybe others also have that type of financial considerations
> *~*Elissa Jill*~*

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Conference dates
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/6/03 10:56:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I too appreciate all that the future planners are doing to make sure that this WONDERFUL event
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/6/03 10:56:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Of course there are
> dates that don't work for everyone, but I think the date most definately has
> to
> work for the planner.
>
> Good luck and thank you in advance.
>
>

I too appreciate all that the future planners are doing to make sure that
this WONDERFUL event continues.
Here's my opinion (FWIW) I think that the conferences should ALL be held
within the same month of each year. Monetarily, if one year it is in November and
the next year it is in April. I'll have to choose ONE. We need to save money
up out of our other expenses to attend and truly NEED that year of savings to
attend. Maybe others also have that type of financial considerations
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
